game.name: Sculptor
game.shortDescription: Create and paint statues of beautiful women, improve your skills and follow the kinetic novel of a sculptor who fell in love with his creation. The game is inspired by the Greek myth of Pygmalion.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create and paint statues of beautiful women, improve your skills and follow the kinetic novel of a sculptor who fell in love with his creation. The game is inspired by the Greek myth of Pygmalion.
